data.name: Instruction_0
data.value: IMPORTANT NOTES:

data.name: Instruction_1
data.value: You are required to observe the following requirements when filling in the application:

data.name: Instruction_1_1
data.value: Use <mark>English</mark> to complete the application unless otherwise specified;

data.name: Instruction_1_2
data.value: Present all monetary figures in <mark>Hong Kong Dollar;</mark>

data.name: Instruction_1_3
data.value: Use <mark>Traditional Chinese characters</mark> for Chinese information;

data.name: Instruction_1_4
data.value: Put <mark>“NA”</mark> where the information sought is not applicable or not available;

data.name: Instruction_2
data.value: Your CASP application shall be submitted before the commencement date of the accelerator programme. Saved draft will not be accepted as official submission

data.name: Instruction_3
data.value: By submitting this application form, you confirm that you have read and agree to the Guides and Notes for the Applicants (CC.RF.010)

data.name: Instruction_4
data.value: Certain part of the application will be pre-filled which are retrieved from your company profile. Please submit your CASP application with the latest information; you can fill in additional information if necessary.

data.name: Instruction_4_1
data.value:
Please prepare and upload the requested supporting documents in Section 5 including, but not limited, to the following:

  • Company documents (e.g. Business Registration, Certificate of Incorporation, etc.) (if applicable)
  • Other supplementary information such as Corporate Structure / Organisation Chart, Curriculum Vitae of team members, pictures, diagrams and business proposal, etc. for illustration of your project idea (if any)

data.name: Instruction_5
data.value: For enquiries, please call (852) 3166 3735 or email to casp@cyberport.hk

data.name: Instruction_6
data.value: Remarks: This application form has been translated into Chinese for reference only. In case of discrepancy, the English version shall prevail.

data.name: Instruction_7
data.value: Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited

data.name: Instruction_8
data.value: Hong Kong Cyberport Management Company Limited

data.name: intruction_you_are
data.value: You are required:

data.name: Step_4_Declaration1
data.value: We are not participating in any other publicity and/or privately funded programme.

data.name: Step_4_Declaration2
data.value: all information providing in this application accompanying information reflects the status of affairs as at the date of submission. I shall inform the Administration of the Cyberport Accelerator Support Programme immidiately if there are subsequetly changes to the above information.

data.name: Step_4_Declaration3
data.value: The ideas of the proposed plan are original without any constituted or potential act of infrigement of the intellectual property rights of other individual and / or organisations.

data.name: Step_4_Declaration4
data.value: We understand the information provided in this application will be disclosed to Cyberport staff for screening purpose. No Confidential Agreement of any kind will be signed with Cyberport or the relevent staff on an ocassion. and

data.name: Step_4_Declaration5
data.value: direct marketing(please see "Direct marketing" section below); and

data.name: Step_4_Declaration6
data.value: handling compliants, legal, Safety and security purposes
